title: Blox Fruits: How to Get and Use Ice Fruit (Guide)

steps.title: Ice Fruit is an Uncommon Elemental type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: Ice Fruit is an Uncommon Elemental type Blox Fruit. It's obtained by purchasing it from the Blox Fruit Dealer for $350,000 or 750 Robux.

steps.title: Ice Fruit is a great fruit for bounty hunting.
steps.content: Ice Fruit is a great fruit for bounty hunting. You can easily stun other players with Ice Fruit, so it's an ideal fruit for new bounty hunters. It also does a decent amount of damage and can counter powerful fruits like Buddha. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Ice Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken.
steps.content: Ice Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken. Fragments can be obtained in several ways, but you'll most likely get them from finishing raids or defeating Sea Beasts. The order in which to awaken your moves is as follows: Z: 500 Fragments F: 2,000 Fragments X: 3,000 Fragments C: 4,000 Fragments V: 5,000 Fragments After awakening Ice Fruit, you'll get two titles: The Ice Queen (#031) and The Ice King (#032).

steps.title: Ice Spears (Z)
steps.content: Ice Spears ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3760 Cooldown: 9 seconds Description: You shoot a number of ice shards at an enemy. If the shards hit the ground and explode, the explosion can break instinct.

steps.title: Ice Surge (X)
steps.content: Ice Surge ( X ) Mastery cost: 25 Mastery Damage: 3223 Cooldown: 14 seconds Description: You create a wave of ice from the ground. This wave damages and knocks back anyone it hits but does not break instinct.

steps.title: Ice Bird (C)
steps.content: Ice Bird ( C ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Damage: 2865 Cooldown: 15 seconds Description: You create a bird made of ice and launch it towards your cursor. The bird will explode once it hits something and stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds. The explosion can also break instinct.

steps.title: Glacial Epoch (V)
steps.content: Glacial Epoch ( V ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Damage: 2686 Cooldown: 26 seconds Description: You turn the ground around you into a hazardous ice field that will freeze and damage enemies. This move can also break instinct.

steps.title: Cold Storm (Z)
steps.content: Cold Storm ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 500 Fragments Damage: 477-6445 Cooldown: 9 seconds Description: You release a series of icy cyclones towards the cursor. If a cyclone hits an enemy, they will be stunned and damaged. It can also break instinct.

steps.title: Glacial Surge (X)
steps.content: Glacial Surge ( X ) Mastery cost: 25 Mastery Fragments cost: 3,000 Fragments Damage: 3581 Cooldown: 14 seconds Description: Similar to Ice Surge, you create a wave of ice from the ground, but the wave is much bigger. This wave will damage, knock back, and break instinct.

steps.title: Frozen Dragon (C)
steps.content: Frozen Dragon ( C ) Mastery cost: 50 Mastery Fragments cost: 4,000 Fragments Damage: 3044 Cooldown: 15 seconds Description: You create a dragon made out of ice that shoots into the air and crashes into the ground where the cursor is aimed. This causes an explosion that causes damage and freezes enemies. This movie can also break instinct.

steps.title: Absolute Zero (V)
steps.content: Absolute Zero ( V ) Mastery cost: 100 Mastery Fragments cost: 5,000 Fragments Damage: 3223 Cooldown: 26 seconds Description: You create a giant ice field with large ice spikes. This move will freeze, damage, and stun everyone within it. It will also break instinct.

steps.title: Ice Skating (F)
steps.content: Ice Skating ( F ) Mastery cost: n/a Fragments cost: 2,000 Fragments Damage: n/a Cooldown: 7 seconds Description: You can skate at high speeds. This move allows you to passively walk on water without taking damage.

steps.title: Elemental Reflex
steps.content: Elemental Reflex You are immune to all attacks from Fighting Styles, Swords, and Guns, unless they are imbued with Aura or the enemy is a higher level than you.

steps.title: Ice Trident
steps.content: Ice Trident When clicking (or tapping on mobile), you will slash forward with a trident made of ice.

steps.title: Frost Walker
steps.content: Frost Walker When you touch seawater, you will create an ice platform that you can walk on. Creating one platform costs four energy.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Amazing fruit for bounty hunters Can very easily stun other players Passive allows you to walk on water Easy to obtain because it's cheap All moves are AoE and can hit multiple targets

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons You can be pushed off your platform into the water and drown Weak in aerial combat Some moves are easy to dodge Some moves are very slow X has a very high knockback
